651630.name: Fantasy Grounds - The Folio: The Complete Roslof Keep Campaign (5E)
651630.description:
The Folio: The Complete Roslof Keep Campaign

Come join the adventure with this comprehensive mega-dungeon!
Compiling the full Roslof Keep Campaign adventures series from Folio 1-6, as well as supplemental mini-adventures 1.5-6.5 and the Nameless Realms Races supplement, this is a true monster of a dungeon crawl.
Written in 5E mechanics, this huge text has been designed to mimic the essence of the classic 1980s 'Orange Spine' hardcovers and has an original cover by iconic artist Jeff Easley.
With both 2D & 3D maps, Iconic Characters, campaign characters sheets, and more, this isn't something to miss out on if you are a true hardcore gamer.
This module includes:
  • Roslof Keep Campaign Adventures series from Folio 1-6
  • Supplemental Mini-Adventures 1.5-6.5
  • Nameless Realms Races supplement
  • Over 100 encounters pre-built and ready to be added to maps with a click of a button.
  • Over 100 story entries with full descriptions and links to images, encounters, treasure parcels, and more.
  • Over 100 images and maps.
  • Over 100 NPCs and Monsters.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Team Twohy LLC
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
